product_name: PATC Hikes in the Washington Region Part C- 3rd Edition
long_description: With all the trail information you need to plan a great outing, Hikes in the Washington Region encourages you to enjoy the region's natural beauty and historical depth throughout its 20 hikes.
short_description: With all the trail information you need to plan a great outing, Hikes in the Washington Region encourages you to enjoy the region's natural beauty and historical depth throughout its 20 hikes.
